data.text: But I started working at bar and bat mitzvahs

data.text: And then, I met my father, finally, when I was 27,

translation.text: Và rồi, tôi đã gặp cha tôi, cuối cùng, khi tôi 27 tuổi,

data.text: and he broke it down to me and said "Yes."

translation.text: và anh ấy đã chia nó với tôi và nói "Có."

data.text: And in the country that he's from,

translation.text: Và ở đất nước mà anh ấy đến từ,

data.text: it was kind of illegal to be Jewish,

translation.text: Người Do Thái là bất hợp pháp,

data.text: and that he fled and there was a war

data.text: and all of this stuff. And so, and then, I believed him,

data.text: but kind of didn't believe him. But I believed him
